answers.answer: Awww... sorry to hear it was up again!  Well, as you know... pre-eclampsia is pregnancy induced high blood pressure.  So, the only cure for it would be for you to deliver (which isn't an option since you still have a while to go).  In any case, it can occur at any time during your pregnancy.  The information you receive from the internet is just giving you a general idea of when many women experience it, so take that info with a grain of salt.The reason the doctors want to monitor you so closely is because it can put you at risk for seizures and it can put your baby in distress... that is, if it isn't monitored closely.  So, you can see why the doctors are concerned and want to keep a close watch on you.  Just keep going to your scheduled appointments and I am sure that you and your little growing baby will be just fine :)  Thanks for keeping us posted...

question: well when i went back to dr BP was still up.. so now they are having me do a 24 hr urine test and than blood work at the end of the 24 hrs to check for pre eclampsia. but the funny thing is i feel fine. i dont feel like anything is different than before and with all my pregainies i have never had problems with bp before. im not sure if i should be concerened or what i can do to help it. i am goin to dr weekly to be montoried but this only started 2 weeks ago. most things i read on say most of ppl get it before the 20 weeks .. why am i starting to have a problem so late???? will it turn into preeclampsia or will i be ok my reading yesterday was 131/90,.  which mine has always been in normal range ... so its not to high but its not normal than they say its high for me and my bottom number is considered high. im sorry but i dont know mych about the reading ccan anyone help me here. i just want my baby to be ok. he moves all the time and good heartbeat every visit,. but i dont know what the affects can be.. anyone been down this rd or know of anyoe who has been , thanks ladies.... hope ya have a wonderful new years and all be safe
title: just a lil update........
